sources.title: The Arctic Giant (1942)
sources.description: A frozen Tyrannosaurus rex is found and put on display in a museum, but when he thaws out and revives, Superman has to stop his rampage! Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-arctic-giant-1942/

metadata.Plot: An expedition unearths a frozen Tyrannosaurus in the Siberian tundra and brings it back to the USA. Naturally, it accidentally thaws and runs amok. Can Superman handle it?
metadata.Writer: Joe Shuster, Jerry Siegel, Bill Turner
metadata.Actors: Joan Alexander, Jackson Beck, Bud Collyer
